# File features/step_definitions/common_steps.rb, line 177
def results
  @results ||= (@model || ThinkingSphinx).send(
    @method,
    @query,
    @options.merge(
      :conditions => @conditions,
      :with       => @with,
      :without    => @without,
      :with_all   => @with_all
    )
  )
end
